title: Urgot is the only fucking juggernaut worth a shit
body:
Because he's a lot safer and more reliable than most of the other juggernauts while still having the insane damage and tank that is typical of juggernauts.

Like why fucking play darius or illaoi? Sure their damage is pretty good, but it's not as insane as other melee carries and the damage is so fucking high in the game that callin darius or illaoi tanky is fucking laughable, because it's not all that hard to murder them in less than 4 seconds, ESPECIALLY because their clunky ass fucking kits make those 4 seconds excruciatingly painful.

Juggernaut class fucking SUCKS.

http://na.op.gg/champion/statistics

Just look at fucking top lane, you have urgot in #1 and then that's it. Somehow fucking cassiopeia is murdering the entire top lane roster (lulz) and the next "best" juggernaut is down at position #13, illaoi, and as someone who plays her fairly religiously, she's fucking ok if the matchup isn't too bad and pure fucking shit otherwise.

Juggernauts don't exist in jungle basically.

Juggernauts don't exist in mid basically.

Juggernauts don't exist in bot basically.

Juggernauts don't exist in support basically.

This fucking class is so disgustingly painful to play minus one fucking champion who should've had his knees batted the fuck out from under him 3 months ago.

Build path doesn't matter. Despite his squishier build and all-in playstyle Aatrox on average dies less than every juggernaut in the game except for Garen, arguably the tankiest juggernaut period. He's not really a diver because he doesn't have the reliable backline access a real diver like Camille, Jax, Irelia, and Xin Zhao have. He has some mobility but it is very short-range, and his abilities are relatively telegraphed.

He was a mistake though, yeah. The champion has virtually no weaknesses.

Shit scaling, inability to bust through tanks after the early game, inability to pin down mobile targets, easily peeled in team fights, lack luster drain-tanking that still gets stuffed by Grevious Wounds...so on and so forth?

Build path does matter. Being a juggernaut kind of implies raid boss status; if Darius dropped all of his current items and went full crit and that was his established build and what he became balanced around he would not be a juggernaut anymore.

Aatrox has more lane safety than any other juggernaut on top of having a revive that lets him walk away, too. 

Warwick does not have reliable back line access either but you would not say he isn't really a diver

Cassiopeia has made her way top lane multiple times over multiple seasons. This is nothing new. However vs certain other top lane matchups she sucks hard. Old Akali, despite her dashes, used to cuck Cassiopeia(doesn't appear so now) when she went top lane especially because of it being a longer lane. Now she loses to cheese picks and Kled, Wukong, Maokai, Olaf, and Galio. All of which aren't played that often. Cassiopeia will of course trump Juggernauts. They can't move very fast, and don't have ways to close the gap on her. So if people are picking Juggernauts top super often, she's going to abuse that.
